timeStampFunc: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION trigger_set_timestamp() RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$ BEGIN NEW.updated_at = NOW(); RETURN NEW; END; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
users:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id serial PRIMARY KEY,
 full_name VARCHAR ( 255 ) NOT NULL,
 first_name VARCHAR ( 255 ) NOT NULL,
 last_name VARCHAR ( 255 ) NOT NULL,
 email VARCHAR ( 255 ) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
 phone_number VARCHAR ( 255 ),
image TEXT,
 created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
 updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());
 DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS set_timestamp ON users CASCADE;
 CREATE TRIGGER set_timestamp
 BEFORE UPDATE ON users
 FOR EACH ROW
 EXECUTE PROCEDURE trigger_set_timestamp();
products:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS products (id serial PRIMARY KEY,
 retail_id VARCHAR ( 255 ) NOT NULL,
 retail_name retail_name_enum NOT NULL,
 product_name VARCHAR ( 255 ) NOT NULL,
 image TEXT,
 thumbnail_image TEXT,
 price_value DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
 price_currency VARCHAR ( 255 ) NOT NULL,
 shipping_cost DOUBLE PRECISION,
 shipping_currency VARCHAR ( 255 ),
 item_href TEXT,
 created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
 updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());
 DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS set_timestamp ON products CASCADE;
 CREATE TRIGGER set_timestamp
 BEFORE UPDATE ON products
 FOR EACH ROW
 EXECUTE PROCEDURE trigger_set_timestamp();
 CREATE UNIQUE INDEX woodie_retail_constraint
 ON products(retail_id, retail_name);
connections:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS connections (id serial PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT NOT NULL,
 follow_id INT NOT NULL,
status VARCHAR ( 255 ) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
REFERENCES users (id),
FOREIGN KEY (follow_id)
REFERENCES users (id));
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS set_timestamp ON connections CASCADE;
 CREATE TRIGGER set_timestamp
 BEFORE UPDATE ON connections
 FOR EACH ROW
 EXECUTE PROCEDURE trigger_set_timestamp();
 CREATE UNIQUE INDEX woogie_follow_constraint
 ON connections(user_id, follow_id);
orders:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS orders (id serial PRIMARY KEY,
 product_id INT NOT NULL,
 order_date TIMESTAMPTZ,
 created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
 updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
 FOREIGN KEY (product_id)
 REFERENCES products (id));
 DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS set_timestamp ON orders CASCADE;
 CREATE TRIGGER set_timestamp
 BEFORE UPDATE ON orders
 FOR EACH ROW
 EXECUTE PROCEDURE trigger_set_timestamp();
notifications:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notifications (id serial PRIMARY KEY,
 receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
 sender_id INT NOT NULL,
 type notification_type_enum NOT NULL,
 dirty BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false, seen BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false, 
 created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
 updated_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(),
 FOREIGN KEY (receiver_id)
 REFERENCES users (id),
 FOREIGN KEY (sender_id)
 REFERENCES users (id)
 );
 DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS set_timestamp ON notifications CASCADE;
 CREATE TRIGGER set_timestamp
 BEFORE UPDATE ON notifications
 FOR EACH ROW
 EXECUTE PROCEDURE trigger_set_timestamp();
 CREATE UNIQUE INDEX woogie_notifications_constraint
 ON notifications(sender_id, receiver_id, type);
